DOC.HEADLINE: CHINESE HIJACKER SENTENCED IN TAIWAN
DOC.TEXT: A Taiwan court sentenced a hijacker to 10 years in prison Wednesday in an attempt to end a spate of hijackings in which 11 Chinese airliners have been commandeered to the island since last April , state television reported . Zhang Hai , 27 , a driver from Tangshan in northern China , hijacked a Xiamen Airlines Boeing 737 to Taiwan last Nov . 5 and asked_for asylum .
